item.title: Meta pulls plug on release of advanced AI model in EU - The Guardian
item.description:
1. Meta pulls plug on release of advanced AI model in EU  The Guardian
  2. Big Tech withholds its products from the EU in response to regulation  Axios
  3. Meta is hitting the brakes on AI  Quartz
  4. Meta will withhold multimodal AI models from the EU amid regulatory uncertainty  Engadget
  5. Meta decides to suspend its generative AI tools in Brazil  Reuters
